Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
JULIUS O'REILLY CROWNED NEW CAESAR OF [[DM.Factions[faction_Marian],MARIAN HEGEMONY]]!


Alphard, [[DM.Factions[faction_Marian],Marian Hegemony]]: Fresh from his conquest of the [[DM.Factions[faction_Illyrian],Illyrian Palatinate]] and the pacification of the former [[DM.Factions[faction_Lothian],Lothian League]], the young son of Caesar Sean O'Reilly returned to Alphard a hero. Declaring his father mentally unstable and unfit to rule, the Marian Senate wasted no time declaring his appointment as new Caesar. With Sean O'Reilly defiantly refuting the Senate appointment, the young Caesar was forced to cut his father down. Sources within the [[DM.Factions[faction_Marian],Marian Hegemony]] Armed Forces familiar with Julius suggest that he has a grand vision for the Hegemony in mind, potentially changing the very fabric of Marian society.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
AMID FEDCOM CIVIL WAR, FREE TIKONOV MOVEMENT SURGES!


Tikonov, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFedCom],Federated Commonwealth]]: Taking advantage of the confusion amid the FedCom Civil War, the so-called "Free Tikonov" independence movement has increased the tempo of their activities against both pro-Steiner and pro-Davion forces. Although the planetary militia nominally fall into the loyalist camp, Free Tikonov sympathies are rampant, and the likelihood that the militia units have been infiltrated is high. Planetary militia forces and units of the Deneb Light Cavalry have reportedly come near open conflict, and Steiner confidence in the militia's loyalty is rapidly waning. With the Tikonov civilian population vocally pro-Capellan, neither Victor nor Katherine will have an easy time retaining control over this vital industrial world.
